H0.text: Which edible nut is found on a variety of Hickory Tree. Walnut

H1.text: Which edible nut is found on a variety of Hickory Tree. Hazelnut

H2.text: Which edible nut is found on a variety of Hickory Tree. Chestnut

H3.text: Which edible nut is found on a variety of Hickory Tree. Pecan

A4.text: The pecan ( pih-KAN, also US:  pih-KAHN, PEE-kan, UK:  PEE-k…ôn; Carya illinoinensis) is a species of hickory native to the Southern United States and northern Mexico in the region of the Mississippi River.

A5.text: The seed is an edible nut used as a snack and in various recipes, such as praline candy and pecan pie.
